data.name: ONE
data.detailed_description:
ONE - survival from the first person with elements of horror, action, sandbox of the open world and all this in sci-fi stylistics. The plot unfolds in 2035, when the second group of colonists goes to Mars to find out why the former and very early colonists perished and disappeared.The protagonist of the game is Bryan O'Callahan, a young astronaut who wakes up on a ship after a long sleep in hibernation and understands that the ship is completely empty and the group with the ship's captain disappeared.

Features:
  • Interesting open world
  • Realistic graphics
  • Beautiful dynamic landscapes of Mars and the expanses of space
  • Intimidating atmosphere
  • Addictive gameplay
  • Realistic physics
  • Incredibly atmospheric sound
  • Full gamepad support
  • Support for 4K resolution textures
data.about_the_game:
ONE - survival from the first person with elements of horror, action, sandbox of the open world and all this in sci-fi stylistics. The plot unfolds in 2035, when the second group of colonists goes to Mars to find out why the former and very early colonists perished and disappeared.The protagonist of the game is Bryan O'Callahan, a young astronaut who wakes up on a ship after a long sleep in hibernation and understands that the ship is completely empty and the group with the ship's captain disappeared.

Features:
  • Interesting open world
  • Realistic graphics
  • Beautiful dynamic landscapes of Mars and the expanses of space
  • Intimidating atmosphere
  • Addictive gameplay
  • Realistic physics
  • Incredibly atmospheric sound
  • Full gamepad support
  • Support for 4K resolution textures

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor with a frequency of 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse + gamepad support.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor with a frequency of 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon 6870 HD or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse + gamepad support.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9.2 or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse + gamepad support.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9.2 or later
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse + gamepad support.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
